title: Wendy Liebman, Joyce J. Scott & Ryan Humbert
teaser: Dee Perry welcomes acclaimed stand-up comedian Wendy Liebman who takes the stage of Hilarities on 4th Street this weekend.  Plus we share the sculptural artistry of Joyce J. Scott on view now at MOCA Cleveland.  And area musician Ryan Humbert looks at the musical tradition of covering the songs of Bob Dylan as he preps for his own Dylan-inspired show at The Music Box Supper Club this weekend.
